body:
Comment 2 by **christophe.hoel**: 
Hi and thanks for help,

i did : $ sudo chmod -R ugo+rwx /var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp-

but it has no effect. I always get the same error as the one reported. 
I can copy myself files into the folder...
How can I know if the file system is full??
I use snow leopard.
